body:
the implication is 
1. she has too much pride to ask for back-up, also she never needed it before her awakening.
2. rich girl is right about the masochism fetish (she's from that family, after all)
3. i'm pretty sure every single one of crimson's girls secretly wants it at around this point of of the story.

I love Crimson.
And all this is super hot. 
But for crying out loud! She's all about setting a trap but goes in without back-up! How are you gonna use yourself as bait without anyone to swoop in once the perps have revealed themselves!?
